titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Bisphenol AF.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4842)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 4,4 (trifluoro-1 (trifluoromethyl) ethylidene) diphenol or 2,2-bis(4-hydroxyphenyl) hexafluoropropane (bisphenol AF).
